sitedata.metadesc: Trusted By Fine Real Estate Professionals

about.abouttext2: Vista Grande is an established, quiet neighborhood in northeast Colorado Springs. Wide, tree-lined streets. Well maintained homes, many with mountain views. Great location close to Chapel Hills Mall with parks, schools, a library and restaurants close by.  Cotton Wood Creek Park offers an indoor swimming pool, frisbee golf, baseball, roller hockey, tennis courts and soccer fields.
